title: Actress Upeksha Swarnamali arrested
paragraphs: Former MP and actress Upeksha Swarnamali has been arrested by the Katugastota police in connection with an accident.
Police said the vehicle she was travelling in had collided with a motorcycle near the Nugawela Divisional Secretariat on the Kandy- Kurunegala Road.
The injured motorcyclist has been admitted to the Peradeniya Hospital.
She is to be produced before the Magistrate today. (Shane Senavirathne)
